params.medIndices: A 2D array where each sub-array contains indices (in the prescription's medications array) to be ordered from the corresponding pharmacy.
params.orderHashes: Array of hashes of order details (off-chain) for each pharmacy order.
params.pharmacyAddresses: Array of pharmacy addresses to order from.
